text: @seanhannity Not hard to "desperately" blame #DonaldTrump when he has EASILY made the case to blame him. HE delayed his response to #coronavirus HE went on YOUR CHANNEL and called this a #Democrat "hoax", #FakeNews and "like the flu". HE stated he "takes no responsibility" Shall we continue? https://t.co/f7a6z8yuES
